name: Short Long Short
description:
Given 2 strings, `a` and `b`, return a string of the form short+long+short, with the shorter string on the outside and the longer string on the inside. The strings will not be the same length, but they may be empty ( `zero` length ). Hint for R users:
The length of string is not always the same as the number of characters
For example: **(Input1, Input2) --> output** ``` ("1", "22") --> "1221" ("22", "1") --> "1221" ```
